body.p:
During an ongoing meeting, as a user, you can personalize the settings for the meeting by clicking
from the control panel. You can change the audio and video settings; report a problem with the application; and view the online help documentation, the privacy policy, and the End User License Agreement.
You can personalize the preferred settings by performing the following procedure:

ol.li:
Click
. The Settings panel is displayed.

li.p: Under Video Settings, choose the preferred camera from the drop-down list.
Under Audio Settings, choose the preferred microphone and speaker from the respective drop-down lists.
Click the Dial In tab to view the dial-in information about the ongoing meeting.

body.p: To report a problem you encountered during a meeting or to share your ideas and feature suggestions about the application, see Report a Problem and Share Feedback.
To refer the online documentation, privacy policy, and the End User License Agreement; use the following procedure.

ol.li:
Click
. From the panel that opens, click the Others tab.
Click the About tab to view the links to the online help, the privacy policy, and the End User License Agreement.
